CloseMap - Simplify Your Real Estate Search on Funda and Pararius

Tired of switching between Funda or Pararius and Google Maps just to check how far a property is from your favorite locations? CloseMap is here to save you time and make house hunting easier!

üè° Why CloseMap?

When browsing real estate listings, one key thing you often need to know is how far a property is from important places like your work, schools, or public transit hubs. Unfortunately, Funda and Pararius don‚Äôt offer this feature, forcing you to manually calculate distances in Google Maps again and again. CloseMap changes that!

üîë How CloseMap Solves the Problem:

- Save Time: No more juggling between tabs or apps to check distances. See how far each listing is from your saved points of interest (POIs) right on the listing page.
- Customizable Transport Options: Select your preferred transport mode for each location ‚Äî car, public transport, or walking. CloseMap instantly shows distances based on your choice.
- Efficient and Accurate: Just click to see the distances from multiple locations like your office, gym, or favorite coffee spot in a single go. It‚Äôs seamless, accurate, and saves you countless clicks.

üöÄ How It Works:

1. Download the Chrome extension and connect with your Google Account.

Start using CloseMap today and say goodbye to endless Google Maps searches!
